# WCEnltd

The goal of WCEnltd is to allow fully flexible estimation of the weighted cumulative effects of the time-varying covariates in time-to-event analysis

## Installation

You can install CoxFlex from github with:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ywang297/WCEnltd")
```
